means: 使（固态物）溶解为液体，使液化

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"融化，溶解"之意。
means: melt ： 最常用词，指任何固体的熔化过程，常引申作"消散、淡化或消失"解。
dissolve ： 多指固体溶于溶剂的过程。
fuse可与melt换用，但侧重指在高温下使两种或两种以上金属的熔合，也可作引申用。

word_mean: 药物加入适量开水，自然溶解。

sentence.Network_en: Kaifu threatened to dissolve the Parliament and call an election.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡夫威胁要解散议会并举行选举。

sentence.Network_en: Substances such as ammonia give out heat when they dissolve.
sentence.Network_cn: 诸如氨气之类的物质在溶解时会释放出热量。

sentence.Network_en: Warm the sugar slightly first to make it dissolve quicker.
sentence.Network_cn: 先将糖稍稍加热，以使其溶解得更快些。

PerfectNetExp.abs: AE中英文对照 ... Pixel Motion→ 像素运动 Dissolve → 溶解 Dancing Dissolve → 动态溶解.
解字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 解任〖 relieve〗 解散〖 dissolve〗 解事〖 besensible〗.
Esp词汇资料 ... resolve 决心归结于; dissolve 使溶解 = insolventa---- 无付款能力的.
hcyu2012的博客 - hcyu2012 - 网易博客 ... normal 正常 dissolve 渐隐 darken 变暗.

list.abs: 微生物学术语双语(中英文)对照 - 豆丁网 ... Guncotton filters： 棉花滤器 Dissolved： 溶解的 Ether： 醚.
dissolvent 溶剂dissolver 溶解器dissolving salt 溶解盐
溶剂(Dissolvent): XYL/PMA【溶剂稀释性】BLT311-70与芳香烃、酯类、酮类、醚酯类溶剂相溶性好,在烃类溶剂中溶解度有限。【树脂配套】 BLT311-70与甲醚化高亚.
dissolved oxygen 溶解氧dissolvent 溶剂；有溶解力的-
染整专业英语 - 豆丁网 ... density 比重、浓度； dissolvability 溶解度； double thread-up （平洗槽）回形穿布.
冶金词汇英语翻译(A-G) ... dissolution 溶解 dissolvability 可溶性 dissolved nitrogen 溶解氮.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'break down into component parts'): from Latin dissolvere, from dis- 'apart' + solvere 'loosen or solve'

entry.def: If a substance dissolves in liquid or if you dissolve it, it becomes mixed with the liquid and disappears.

example.ex: Heat gently until the sugar dissolves...
example.tran: 慢慢加热直到糖溶解为止。

example.ex: Dissolve the salt in a little boiled water.
example.tran: 将盐溶解在少许开水中。

entry.def: When an organization or institution is dissolved, it is officially ended or broken up.

example.ex: The King agreed to dissolve the present commission.
example.tran: 国王同意解散目前的委员会。

entry.def: When a parliament is dissolved, it is formally ended, so that elections for a new parliament can be held.

example.ex: The present assembly will be dissolved on April 30th...
example.tran: 现在的议会将于 4 月 30 日解散。

example.ex: Kaifu threatened to dissolve the Parliament and call an election.
example.tran: 卡夫威胁要解散议会并举行选举。

entry.tran: 解除(婚姻关系）；终止（商业协议)
entry.def: When a marriage or business arrangement is dissolved, it is officially ended.
If something such as a problem or feeling dissolves or is dissolved, it becomes weaker and disappears.

example.tran: 他刚刚萌生的乐观情绪消失了。

example.ex: Lenny still could not dissolve the nagging lump of tension in his chest.
example.tran: 莱尼仍不能消除令他不安的紧张感。

means.word_mean: 1. (film) a gradual transition from one scene to the next; the next scene is gradually superimposed as the former scene fades out
1. cause to go into a solution;

sentences.sentence: "The recipe says that we should dissolve a cup of sugar in two cups of water"
"The sugar quickly dissolved in the coffee"

means.word_mean: 5. stop functioning or cohering as a unit;

sentences.sentence: "The political wing of the party dissolved after much internal fighting"
"She dissolved into tears when she heard that she had lost all her savings in the pyramid scheme"

means.word_mean: 9. become or cause to become soft or liquid;

sentences.sentence: "The giant iceberg dissolved over the years during the global warming phase"

means.word_mean: 10. bring the association of to an end or cause to break up;

sentences.sentence: "The President dissolved the parliament and called for new elections"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He goes from Africa to L.A. in just one dissolve.

stems_affixes.word_buile: solv溶解,解决,松开+able可以……的→adj.可以解的,可以解决的
in无+solvent有偿债能力的→adj.无钱还债的
solv溶解,解决,松开+ent……的→adj.有偿债能力的 n.溶剂
re再+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→v.决心;[使]分解,溶解;决议 n.解决;决心
solv溶解,解决,松开+ency表名词→n.溶解力,还债能力
solv溶解,解决,松开+ent……的→adj.有偿债能力的 n.溶剂

stems_affixes.value_cn: 免除责任,宣布赦免罪过
stems_affixes.word_buile: ab去掉,免除+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→松开→免罪
dis分开+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→松开分散→没有限制
re再+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→v.决心;[使]分解,溶解;决议 n.解决;决心
solv溶解,解决,松开+e→v.解决,解答

Sentence.sentence: Town meetings called to discuss the problem inevitably dissolved into confrontations.

means.word_mean: 结束,解除（婚姻关系）；终止（商业协议）；解散（议会）

sentences.cn: 他们结束了他们的婚姻。

jushi.english: The tension between those two countries dissolved.
jushi.chinese: 那两个国家间的紧张状态解除了。

jushi.english: His prospects for winning the election were dissolving rapidly.
jushi.chinese: 他当选的希望正在迅速破灭。
